title: [Client] Elise missing skin champion select
body: Played elise for the first time in patch 5.12 and after I locked her in I saw that the death blossom skin was missing. I don't own this skin but I thought that I should report this issue anyway. I attached a screenshot as proof and info of the issue. Not sure if this is a consistent issue or just a one time thing.

replies.body: This has been happening for a really long time, I can confirm.

Hiya! 

Thanks for the report - we'll look into it!
I reported this issue about a month ago, surprised its still not addressed o;
